attributes.action: Let Excellent Nurses get Clinical Excellence Bonuses Too!
attributes.additional_details: Nurses work hard everyday to look after you and your family's health. Since the pay freeze nurses have suffered harshly while at the top end of the scale senior consultants have been able to receive "clinical excellence" bonuses of up to £75,800. ANd that's on top of the big money we pay them to do their jobs. Let nurses have them too!
